§AUDIOPATH[
§
]AUDIOPATH§
§PARTS[
§
]PARTS§
§TOOLS[
§
]TOOLS§
§TEXTFIELDS[
§Slide List (2) - Colour Codes
§21
]TEXTFIELDS§
§TAGS[
§slide list; colour codes; selected item; chapter slides; title slide; draft mode; draft tab
]TAGS§
§ANNODRAFT[
§The slides in the list can be distinguished by color: -Dark blue-grey (1) is the Title slide of the Project. It must always be the first slide in the Gallery.   The title presented in the list is prefixed with "Project: ". -Light blue (2) denotes a Chapter Slide. The title presented in the list is prefixed with "Chapter <chapter-number>: " - (3) denotes a standard slide in the gallery, which is not currently displayed.  - (4) denotes the currently selected slide. Note that the selected slide is the only one whose colouring extends to the slide's ordinal number.     
]ANNODRAFT§
§ANNOFINAL[
§<html dir="ltr"><head></head><body contenteditable="true"><h3><font face="Segoe UI" size="4">The slides in the list can be distinguished by colour:&nbsp;</font></h3><div><ul><li><span style="font-family: 'Segoe UI';"><b>(1) </b>(blue grey) is the title slide of the project.&nbsp;</span></li><ul><li><span style="font-family: 'Segoe UI';">It must always be the first slide in the gallery.</span></li><li><span style="font-family: 'Segoe UI';">T</span><span style="font-family: 'Segoe UI';">he title presented in the list is prefixed with "Project: ".&nbsp;<br><br></span></li></ul><li><span style="font-family: 'Segoe UI';"><b>(2)</b> (light blue) denotes a chapter slide. <br>The title presented in the list is prefixed with "Chapter </span><chapter-number style="font-family: 'Segoe UI';">: "&nbsp;</chapter-number></li></ul><ul><li><span style="font-family: 'Segoe UI';"><b>(3) </b>denotes a standard slide in the gallery, which is not currently displayed. &nbsp;<br><br></span></li><li><chapter-number style="font-family: 'Segoe UI';"><b>(4) </b>denotes the slide currently displayed in the <b>gallery browser</b>. <br><u>Note:</u>&nbsp;The selected slide is the only one whose colouring extends to the slide's ordinal number.&nbsp;</chapter-number><span style="font-family: 'Segoe UI';">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></li></ul></div><font face="Segoe UI">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</body></html>&nbsp;&nbsp;
]ANNOFINAL§
